actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to a establish certain requirements related to the planning and management, and the determination of economic and other benefits and costs, of United States Army Corps of Engineers civil works projects for the conservation and development of water and related resources, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to: (1) make technical amendments relating to cost/benefit determinations with respect to civil works projects of the Army Corps of Engineers involving beach erosion control; and (2) direct the Secretary of the Army to develop long-range plans for beach nourishment and inlet management. Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1976 to direct the Secretary to consider the protection of coastal resources through the placement on State beaches of beach quality sand which has been dredged in constructing and maintaining navigation inlets and channels adjacent to such beaches as being in the public interest whenever such sand would otherwise be disposed of offshore. Authorizes appropriations for developing such plans.

titles.title: A bill to a establish certain requirements related to the planning and management, and the determination of economic and other benefits and costs, of United States Army Corps of Engineers civil works projects for the conservation and development of water and related resources, and for other purposes.
